The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence .`` Bringing back the Fairness Doctrine would amount to government control over political views expressed on the public airways. We must pass the Broadcaster Freedom Act and bury the Fairness Doctrine once and for all.
